actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 93-761.
Measure passed House, amended, with an amendment to the title.
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel.

titles.title: A bill to permit the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel, and for other purposes.
